name: Tap Tap Escape
description:
Tap the screen to jump or to change the direction without fall off the path. Double tap to perform the super leap to avoid the deadly traps, obstacles and to stay away of the giant fire ball that haunts you. Sounds easy... right? How far can you get?

Features:
• Play with 30 different characters (Including Celebrities and Super Heroes).
• Hourly rewards (Free Coins) to unlock new characters.
• Play online with your friends (leader boards and achievements).
